entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing late in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
